header: Léo FILOCHE : 4th year student in computer science (M1: ESIR – Université de Rennes, France) looking for a summer internship (June - September 2023)

articles.title: Engineering degree in computer science
articles.content: Courses in CS and SW engineering at ESIR, Université de Rennes. (MSc degree equivalent)

articles.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
articles.content: General training in CS at Université de Rennes 1 (ISTIC) – Years 1 & 2

articles.title: Internship in a research laboratory
articles.content: Participation to the development of an opensource webapp of exam sheet correction (GitHub). Several missions: page of statistics (Angular), OCR for MCQ analyze (OpenCV Python), and creation of an API to link it to the app (FastAPI ~ Swagger based).

articles.title: Administrative assistant
articles.content: Clerical work for the organization of the high school diploma: reception, notetaking, archiving…

articles.title: While Compiler
articles.content: Creation of a compiler for a basic language called 'while'. Implementation in Java of the toolchain's main phases to generate and run an executable (in C++) from a .while file.

articles.title: Microservice based web app
articles.content: Creation of a web app with a backend (NestJS) and a frontend (Angular), and division into microservices with Docker. Addition of other microservices such as a mailing.

articles.title: Ant colony simulation
articles.content: Development of a simplified multi-agent system in C++ simulating the behavior of ants emitting pheromones to help their congeners in their food search.

articles.title: If you want to know more about my coding background, I recommend you to go on my school-projects page on GitHub.
Orange-Nokia Challenge
articles.content: Finalists of this innovation challenge. The edition's theme was on Digital technologies for Inclusion.

articles.title: Model United Nations (RILMUN)
articles.content: Simulation of an ambassador's role, using debate and vote to solve a hypothetical crisis.

articles.title: Basketball
articles.content: For 12 years. In club and university

articles.title: Trumpet
articles.content: Individual courses (9 years) and orchestra (7 years)
